content:
Kolhary/Sussholz family

1 Abraham KOLHARY                    1751-52 - 1817 #191 (Anschel) {census family 468}
 + Breundel                          1755-57 - 1829 #303 (Israel)
  2x Anszel KOLHARY                  1775
  2x Israel SUSSHOLZ                 1775-77 - 1832 #275
    + Rosel ROSENBERG                1780-82 (Pinkus)
